scripts.presetup: npx cli-confirm "Are you sure? This will clean up this repo and reinitialize Git. [y/n]"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:clean && npm run setup:git && npm run setup:install
scripts.setup:clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock npm-debug.log yarn-error.log .git dist LICENSE README.md
scripts.setup:git: git init && git add .gitignore package.json src/ webpack.prod.js webpack.dev.js && git commit --no-verify --message "Initial commit"
scripts.postsetup: npx move-cli package.dist.json package.json && git commit --all --amend --no-edit --quiet
